title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 72.5 - Exempt practice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 72.5 - Exempt practice

State Regulations
A psychologist eligible for exempt practice in accordance
with section
7605
(8)
of the Education Law, shall notify the
department of the time and place of such exempt practice. Acceptable
notification of the department shall be submitting the form prescribed by the
department and payment of a $10 fee. The form shall identify the setting at
which the psychologist will practice in New York State, which may include the
use of distance technology acceptable to the department, and an affirmation
that the psychologist shall comply with the laws, rules and regulations that
define the practice of psychology in this State. Practice under this one-time
exemption shall not exceed 10 consecutive business days or a total of 15
business days in a 90-day period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
72.5

Amended

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
